sentences.en: Contemporary sterling silver stiletto earrings with links forged to represent connection.
sentences.cn: 该系列中的纯银耳环表达出浓烈的城市感觉.

sentences.en: Discreet and easy to use, the SoleMates High attaches easily to most stiletto and kitten heels.
sentences.cn: 谨慎的,易于使用, SoleMates高希勒?可轻松连接到最短剑和小猫高跟鞋.

sentences.en: He snapped the little lock with the blade of his stiletto.
sentences.cn: 他用短剑刀口迅速将锁撬开.

sentences.en: Hummingbirds have stiletto - like bills to probe the deepest nectar - bearing flowers.
sentences.cn: 蜂鸟有钻孔锥一样的喙来探进有花蜜花朵的最深处.

sentences.en: Our specialty in stiletto embroidery of cotton, polyester, linen, wool fabric and cotton blends!
sentences.cn: 在全棉 、 涤布 、 麻类 、 毛料及混纺的雕孔绣花!

sentences.en: When he turned the stiletto was in his band.
sentences.cn: 当他转过身来时,短剑已握在手中.

phrases.tran_cn: n. （女式高跟皮鞋的）细鞋跟
